About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

Hi, I'm Eric and I'm a web developer. I like building clean sites that load fast look good on whatever device you have in front of you.

I'm a pretty typical San Diegan. I prefer working from where inspiration strikes. *Usually after I've had a few waves

If you have a small business or need a personal site done, I'll knock it out for you. No time to towel off, we've got work to do! **after that breakfast burrito, of course.

I am your local web developer..
